Literature.Title: Antimicrobial Peptides with Potential for Biofilm Eradication: Synthesis and Structure Activity Relationship Studies of Battacin Peptides
Literature.Author: Cameron AJ, De Zoysa GH, Hegde VV, Raghothama S, Sarojini V

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Erwinia amylovora 1501(MIC=9-14µM),Erwinia amylovora(MIC=14-23µM),Escherichia coli DH5alpha(MIC=5-9µM),Pseudomonas syringae pv. actinidiae(MIC=14-23µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=14-23µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=5-9µM)
